mapper.insert: insert into Member (id, password, name, nickname, phone, email, regdate) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{email}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update Member set id= #{id}, password= #{password}, name= #{name}, nickname= #{nickname}, phone= #{phone}, email= #{email}, regdate= sysdate + 9/24 where id = #{id}
